issue_info.description: An object that contains issue information (華御結)

brand.description: A string of the issuer brand name (should be '華御結' only)

shop_code.description: A string of the shop code (mostly should be abbreviations in 3 charaters)

shop_address.description: A string of the shop address (should be Chinese)

shop_telephone.description: A string of the shop telephone

issue_number.description: A string of issue number (賬單號碼)

issue_datetime.description: A string of issue datetime (結賬時間)

pos_terminal.description: A string of the pos terminal (POS編號)

subtotal.description: A string of the subtotal (小計) in this invoice, it should be a number only

discount.description: A string of the discount (優惠) in this invoice, it should be a number only

total_amount.description: A string of the total amount (總計) in this invoice, it should be a number only

payment.description: A string of the payment (付款方法) in this invoice

remark.description: A string parse json of the handwritten information in this invoice
